tool.name: Dist Bcl2Qseq
tool.description: Convert Illumina bcl files to qseq on Hadoop
tool.command: seal_galaxy.py #import os #set $exists = os.path.exists(os.path.join($GALAXY_DATA_INDEX_DIR, "seal_galaxy_conf.yaml")) #if $exists --conf ${GALAXY_DATA_INDEX_DIR}/seal_galaxy_conf.yaml #end if --input $input_data --output $output1 dist_bcl2qseq.py #if $modules: -m "$modules" #end if #if $advanced.control == 'show' and $advanced.bcl2qseq_bin: --bclToQseq-path $advanced.bcl2qseq_bin #end if

param.name: modules
param.label: modules to load before running bclToQseq (optional)

param.name: bcl2qseq_bin
param.label: Full path to bclToQseq binary (needed only if the executable isn't in the PATH)

tool.help: This is a Pydoop-based distributed version of Illumina's bclToQseq tool.
